    This trains a subject apply a diagnostic goal: trainCjGD each layer individually, and measure the ideal rate for each phase.
    LayerRateDiagnosticTrainer.LayerStats
    The type LayerBase stats.
    RoundRobinTrainer
    This basic training class provides support for a sequence of independant training configuration, e.g.
    Step
    Data describing the result of a given training iteration evaluation.
    TrainingMonitor
    The base class for defining callbacks to monitor training tasks.
    ValidatingTrainer
    This training class attempts to manage the sample size hyperparameter and convergence criteria via the periodic evaluation of a validation function.
    ValidatingTrainer.TrainingPhase
    The type Training phase.
